page.title: 14ENTERTAINMENT IN CANON PYON
page.content: Many of the{social gatherings}are fund raising efforts.Money is needed for the ancient Churches,the School and Parish Hall etc.Also events to raise money for charities.{Fund raising {events have been:}coffee mornings,wine and cheese parties,Old Tyme Music Hall balls,discos,plays, films,barbecues, fetes,flower festivals sponsored walks silences,knit-ins,soap-box derbys, pumpkin growing, harvest suppers,folk dances,fashion shows,barn dances,car boot sales,jumble sales,raffles, marathons,dog- shows,comic cricket matches,whist drives,garden crawls, pantomimes,organ recitals,tractor rides, auctions, lunches,concerts, musical munches and movable feasts.In the latter we begin with an apertif at one house,starters at another and so on through a delightful evening.{Who {says nothing happens in the country!
